name: 陳文學
objective:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：
常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，特殊函數及級數解
schedule:
第一週 First Order Differential Equations, Preliminary Concepts
第二週 Separable Equations, Linear Differential Equations
第三週 Exact Differential Equations, Integrating Factors
第四週 Homogeneous, Bernoulli, Reccati Equations and Applications of Electrical Circuits
第五週 Second Order Differential Equations, Preliminary Concepts
第六週 Theory of Solutions, Reduction of Order
第七週 The Constant Coefficient Homogeneous Linear Equations, Euler Equations
第八週 The Nonhomogeneous Equation
第九週 Application of Second Order Differential Equations, Midterm Exam
第十週 The Laplace Transform, Definition and Properties
第十一週 Solution of Initial Value Problems, Shifting Theorems
第十二週 Convolution Theorem, Unit Impulses and The Dirac Delta Function
第十三週 Laplace Transform Solution of Systems
第十四週 Differential Equations with Polynomial Coefficients
第十五週 Series Solution, Initial Value Problems
第十六週 Using Recurrence Relations
第十七週 Singular points and the Method of Frobenius
第十八週 Second Solutions and Logarithm Factors, Final Exam.
materials:
Textbook: Advanced Engineering Mathematics 6th Edition
Peter V. O’Neil
Reference Book：Differential Equations with Boundary-Value Problems 6th Ed.
Dennis G. Zill and Michael R. Cullen
